5 void TransformEstimator::conf_callback(calib::TransformEstimationConfig &config, uint32_t level)
6 {
7  this->weight = config.planes_weight;
8 
9  this->use_points = config.use_points;
10  this->use_planes = config.use_planes;
11  this->compute_rotation = config.compute_rotation;
12  this->compute_translation = config.compute_translation;
13  this->project_points = config.project_points;
14 }

16 /*
17 * @brief Add new points to the estimator.
18 *
19 * @param points Vector of points to add.
20 * @param source Whether these points are from the source (or target).
21 */
22 void TransformEstimator::addPoints(vector<Eigen::Vector3f> points, bool source)
23 {
24  vector<Eigen::Vector3f>* pts;
25  if (!source)
26  {
27  for (int i = 0; i < points.size(); i++)
28  {
29  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("Adding point: " << points[i].transpose());
30  this->points_source.push_back(this->project(points[i], source));
31  }
32  }
33  else
34  {
35  for (int i = 0; i < points.size(); i++)
36  {
37  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("Adding point: " << points[i].transpose());
38  this->points_target.push_back(this->project(points[i], source));
39  }
40  }
41 }
42 
43 Eigen::Vector3f TransformEstimator::project(Eigen::Vector3f point, bool source)
44 {
45  Eigen::Vector3f proj = point;
46  if (this->planes_source.size() == 2 && this->planes_target.size() == 2)
47  {
48  std::vector<Eigen::Vector4f> planes;
49  if (source)
50  {
51  planes = this->planes_source;
52  }
53  else
54  {
55  planes = this->planes_target;
56  }
57  Eigen::Vector3f normal1(planes[0][0], planes[0][1], planes[0][2]);
58  Eigen::Vector3f normal2(planes[1][0], planes[1][1], planes[1][2]);
59  Eigen::Vector3f intersec = normal1.cross(normal2);
60  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("\tProject on " << intersec.transpose());
61  proj = point.dot(intersec) * intersec;
62  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("\tResult: " << proj.transpose());
63  }
64  return proj;
65 }

68 * @brief Add new planes to the estimator.
69 *
70 * @param planes Vector of planes to add.
71 * @param source Whether these planes are from the source (or target).
72 */
73 void TransformEstimator::addPlanes(vector<Eigen::Vector4f> planes, bool source)
74 {
75  vector<Eigen::Vector4f>* p;
76  if (!source)
77  {
78  p = &(this->planes_source);
79  }
80  else
81  {
82  p = &(this->planes_target);
83  }
84  for (int i = 0; i < planes.size(); i++)
85  {
86  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("Adding plane: " << planes[i].transpose() << " with weight " << 1);
87  p->push_back(planes[i]);
88  }
89  while (this->planes_weights.size() < p->size())
90  {
91  this->planes_weights.push_back(1);
92  }
93 }

95 void TransformEstimator::addPlanes(vector<Eigen::Vector4f> planes, bool source, float w)
96 {
97  vector<Eigen::Vector4f>* p;
98  if (!source)
99  {
100  p = &(this->planes_source);
101  }
102  else
103  {
104  p = &(this->planes_target);
105  }
106  for (int i = 0; i < planes.size(); i++)
107  {
108  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("Adding plane: " << planes[i].transpose() << " with weight " << w);
109  p->push_back(planes[i]);
110  }
111  while (this->planes_weights.size() < p->size())
112  {
113  this->planes_weights.push_back(w);
114  }
115 }

117 /*
118 * @brief Reset object vectors.
119 */
120 void TransformEstimator::reset()
121 {
122  ROS_DEBUG("Reset matches");
123  this->planes_weights.clear();
124  this->points_source.clear();
125  this->points_target.clear();
126  this->planes_source.clear();
127  this->planes_target.clear();
128 }

130 /*
131 * @brief Estimate rotation.
132 */
133 Eigen::Matrix3f TransformEstimator::getRotation()
134 {
135  Eigen::Matrix3f K = this->computeRotCorr();
136  Eigen::JacobiSVD<Eigen::Matrix3f> svd(K, Eigen::ComputeFullV | Eigen::ComputeFullU);
137  Eigen::Matrix3f R = svd.matrixU() * svd.matrixV().transpose();
138  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("Rotation:" << endl << R);
139  Eigen::DiagonalMatrix<float, 3> D(1, 1, R.determinant());
140  R = svd.matrixU() * D * svd.matrixV().transpose();
141  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("Regularized rotation:" << endl << R);
142 
143  return R;
144 }
145 
146 /*
147 * @brief Estimate translation.
148 *
149 * @param R Estimated rotation.
150 */
151 Eigen::Vector3f TransformEstimator::getTranslation(Eigen::Matrix3f R)
152 {
153  if (this->isValid())
154  {
155  int M = this->points_source.size();
156  int N = this->planes_source.size();
157  Eigen::Vector3f t;
158 
159  Eigen::Matrix3f A1;
160  Eigen::Vector3f b1;
161  Eigen::MatrixX3f A2(N, 3);
162  Eigen::VectorXf b2(N);
163 
164  if (M > 0) // if there is point matches
165  {
166  A1 = Eigen::Matrix3f::Identity(3, 3);
167  A1 *= M;
168  b1 = this->computeCentroid(this->points_target) - R * this->computeCentroid(this->points_source);
169  b1 *= M;
170  }
171  if (N > 0) // if there is plane matches
172  {
173  for (int i = 0; i < N; i++)
174  {
175  for (int j = 0; j < 3; j++)
176  {
177  A2(i, j) = planes_weights[i] * this->planes_target[i](j);
178  }
179  b2(i) = planes_weights[i] * (this->planes_source[i](3) - this->planes_target[i](3));
180  }
181  }
182 
183  // stack A and b and compute t
184  if (N > 0)
185  {
186  if (M > 0) // both planes and points
187  {
188  Eigen::MatrixX3f A(N+3, 3);
189  Eigen::VectorXf b(N+3);
190  A << A1, A2;
191  b << b1, b2;
192  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("A =" << endl << A);
193  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("b =" << endl << b);
194 
195  t = (A.transpose() * A).inverse() * A.transpose() * b;
196  }
197  else // only planes
198  {
199  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("A =" << endl << A2);
200  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("b =" << endl << b2);
201  t = (A2.transpose() * A2).inverse() * A2.transpose() * b2;
202  }
203  }
204  else // only points
205  {
206  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("A =" << endl << A1);
207  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("b =" << endl << b1);
208  t = (A1.transpose() * A1).inverse() * A1.transpose() * b1;
209  }
210 
211  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("t =" << endl << t);
212  return t;
213  }
214 }

216 /*
217 * @brief Estimate transform.
218 */
219 Eigen::Affine3d TransformEstimator::getTransform(bool transl, bool rot)
220 {
221  if (this->planes_source.size() == 2 && this->planes_target.size() == 2 && this->points_source.size() == 0 && this->points_target.size() == 0)
222  {
223  std::vector<Eigen::Vector3f> zero;
224  zero.push_back(Eigen::Vector3f(0,0,0));
225  this->addPoints(zero, true);
226  this->addPoints(zero, false);
227  }
228 
229  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("Compute transform with:");
230  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("\t" << points_source.size() << " points:");
231  for (int i = 0; i < this->points_source.size(); i++)
232  {
233  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("\t\t" << this->points_source[i].transpose() << " -> " << this->points_target[i].transpose());
234  }
235  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("\t" << planes_source.size() << " planes:");
236  for (int i = 0; i < this->planes_source.size(); i++)
237  {
238  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("\t\t" << this->planes_source[i].transpose() << " -> " << this->planes_target[i].transpose());
239  }
240  Eigen::Matrix4f H = Eigen::Matrix4f::Identity();
241  Eigen::Matrix3f R = Eigen::Matrix3f::Identity();
242  if (rot)
243  {
244  R = this->getRotation();
245  H.topLeftCorner(3, 3) = R;
246  }
247  if (transl)
248  {
249  H.topRightCorner(3, 1) = this->getTranslation(R);
250  }
251  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("transform =" << endl << H);
252  Eigen::Affine3d T;
253  T.matrix() = H.cast<double>();
254  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("H =" << endl << H);
255  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Compute transform with " << points_source.size() << " points and " << planes_source.size() << " planes.");
256  return T;
257 }

259 /*
260 * @brief Estimate transform.
261 */
262 Eigen::Affine3d TransformEstimator::getTransform()
263 {
264  return this->getTransform(true, true);
265 }

267 /*
268 * @brief Compute the centroid of a point set.
269 *
270 * @param vec Input vectors.
271 */
272 Eigen::Vector3f TransformEstimator::computeCentroid(vector <Eigen::Vector3f> vec)
273 {
274  Eigen::Vector3f centroid(0, 0, 0);
275  int n = vec.size();
276  for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
277  {
278  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("\tAdding\t" << vec[i].transpose());
279  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("\t\tCurrent centroid\t" << centroid.transpose());
280  centroid += vec[i];
281  }
282  centroid /= (float) n;
283  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("Points centroid: " << centroid.transpose());
284  return centroid;
285 }
286 
287 /*
288 * @brief Compute the correlation matrix for rotation estimation.
289 */
290 Eigen::Matrix3f TransformEstimator::computeRotCorr()
291 {
292  Eigen::Matrix3f K = Eigen::Matrix3f::Zero(3, 3);
293  Eigen::Vector3f ps = this->computeCentroid(this->points_source);
294  Eigen::Vector3f pt = this->computeCentroid(this->points_target);
295  if (this->isValid())
296  {
297  if (this->points_source.size() > 0)
298  {
299  for (int i = 0; i < this->points_source.size(); i++)
300  {
301  K += (this->points_target[i] - pt) * (this->points_ssource[i] - ps).transpose();
302  }
303  }
304  if (this->planes_source.size() > 0)
305  {
306  Eigen::Vector3f Ns;
307  Eigen::Vector3f Nt;
308  for (int i = 0; i < this->planes_source.size(); i++)
309  {
310  Ns = this->planes_source[i].block(0, 0, 3, 1);
311  Nt = this->planes_target[i].block(0, 0, 3, 1);
312  K += (Nt * Ns.transpose()) * this->planes_weights[i];
313  }
314  }
315  }
316  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("rotation correlation =" << endl << K);
317  return K;
318 }
319 
320 /*
321 * @brief Check if the inputs provided are sufficient to estimate transform.
322 */
323 bool TransformEstimator::isValid()
324 {
325  bool valid = true;
326  if (this->points_source.size() != this->points_target.size()) {valid = false;};
327  if (this->planes_source.size() != this->planes_target.size()) {valid = false;};
328  if (this->planes_source.size() != this->planes_weights.size()) {valid = false;};
329  if (this->planes_source.size() + this->points_source.size() < 3) {valid = false;};
330  if (valid)
331  {
332  ROS_DEBUG("Valid inputs !");
333  }
334  else
335  {
336  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Invalid input for transform estimation:");
337  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("\tPoints: " << points_source.size() << ", " << points_target.size());
338  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("\tPlanes: " << planes_source.size() << ", " << planes_target.size());
339  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("\tWeights: " << planes_weights.size());
340  }
341  return valid;
342 }
